column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Alan - Thanks for your review. I'm glad you said yes to your students' suggestion to visit us. We sometimes make the analogy that 10-cent ramen is to instant coffee what JINYA Ramen is to Starbucks. The soup and noodles cost a bit more
column2: but when you taste our ramen
column3: you know where the money goes. Hopefully you'll visit us again and try another bowl. We look forward to serving you again soon.
